error_patterns.error: HTTPSConnectionPool: Max retries exceeded (Caused by ProxyError('Unable to connect to proxy', OSError('Tunnel connection failed: 403 Forbidden')))
error_patterns.root_cause: BrightData proxy requires authentication credentials in URL format. Plain http://localhost:24000 gets rejected.
error_patterns.prevention: Always include proxy authentication when using Luminati Proxy Manager
error_patterns.workaround: JobSpy works without proxy for reasonable volumes (50-200 jobs/session)
error_patterns.documentation: README_JOBSPY.md documents both proxy and no-proxy approaches

error_patterns.error: Connection from your IP (172.19.0.1) is forbidden
error_patterns.root_cause: Luminati proxy manager blocks Docker container IP by default. Requires explicit whitelisting.
error_patterns.solution: Add Docker network IP to proxy_manager_config.json whitelist_ips: ['127.0.0.1', '172.19.0.1'] or use range '172.0.0.0/8'
error_patterns.prevention: Configure proxy whitelist for all Docker network IPs during setup
error_patterns.workaround: Continue without proxy - works perfectly for reasonable volumes
error_patterns.impact: Low - proxy optional for JobSpy, only needed for 1000+ jobs/day

resolved_issues.resolution: Use uc.ChromeOptions() not selenium.Options(), add excludeSwitches

prevention_checklist: Always use authenticated proxy URLs for BrightData
Whitelist Docker IPs in proxy manager config
Test without proxy first for simple scraping tasks
Keep CSS selectors flexible with multiple fallbacks
